MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
―And now, it's the day of the festival. With the busy main street at my side,
I head straight for the shrine. Of course, my goal is to meet Ohana.

As I wait in the precincts of the large shrine, Ohana appears on the platform.
Standing across from her would be the Tsukiyo Banshuu.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I look forward to working with you♪
After politely bowing deeply to each other, the game begins in front of God.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Hah, yah!
Ohana's opponent is frighteningly agile. From their every move, you can tell that they are quite skilled. They are quite strong, but Ohana is even better.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my, fufu~ You shouldn't look away during a battle, you know~?

Ohana lightly avoids her opponent's attack and thrusts her fist out.
It is a strong, yet beautifully flowing movement.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmmm...Your feet seem to not be moving. Sorry, excuse me♪

Although the opponent puts up a reasonably good fight,
the result of the handoff is an overwhelming victory for Ohana. It's to be expected.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
...May Nishiki be a place where everyone, children and adults alike,
can eat a full meal and live a healthy life!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thank you very much.

Ohana addresses the audience and takes a final bow.
The crowd gathered applauds and cheers. It's quite natural after such a good fight.

Good work, Ohana.
They seemed like a pretty strong opponent, but you had nothing to worry about.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
No, no. The other Tsukiyo Banshuu was strong, too!
If I were to use a metaphor...it would be like fighting three Finchleys at the same time?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But I was stronger, that's all I can say.
Yes, you're beaming actually. It's a very smooth thing to say, though.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh yeah, Conductor. On your way here, did you already go to the main street?
No, I didn't see it. It looked like a bustling place, but I couldn't miss your big day, so I came straight to the shrine.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I thought it would be a good opportunity for you to enjoy the Nishiki festival today...
What do you think?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
If you would like to join me, why don't we go around the festival?
There are many food stalls serving delicious food today!
I want to take a look around a bit, since it's a good opportunity. But I'm not sure if I can wander around by myself, and rather, I was wondering if I could ask for help.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fufu, of course~
Well, let's get going♪
The main street is crowded with people all over the place.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
There is a big parade on the main street.
They carry a small shrine of the gods on their shoulders and parade through the town in large numbers.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Everyone is looking forward to it. Oh...Look, here it comes!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Heave-ho♪ Heave-ho♪ Heave-ho with the shrine~♪

I see, so that's why there are so many people here...
Well, if we're not careful, we'll be swept away by the momentum.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are you okay? If we get lost here, we're in trouble...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, I've got an idea.
I'm going to borrow your arm for a minute. Here we go~

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hmmm...We'll walk arm in arm like this.
This way, we don't have to worry about being separated from each other.

Ohana, with our arms entwined, brings her body snugly to mine.
We definitely won't lose sight of each other like this.

But it's almost too close to, well, you know, "that", and she's kind of touching...
I'm sure the polite thing to do here is to pretend not to notice.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor, are you hungry?

As a matter of fact, I am pretty hungry.
The good smell of the food stalls around is just what I had been thinking about earlier.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Then let's buy some food nearby and have lunch. Yeah~
Oh, that food stall over there looks good. That store has a great reputation.

We line up at several stalls to buy some affordable food.
After she finishes shopping, Ohana is stopped by a passerby.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
What? Oh me? Yes, I was at the shrine earlier...
Oh, you were watching me? Fufu, thank you very much.

They saw how Ohana fought at the shrine earlier and became a fan.
Ohana shakes hands with a smile. I wonder to myself if she will become even more desirable and whatnot.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh? Oh my~?

People who notice Ohana start to gather in droves.
In no time at all, a huge crowd of people has gathered in the middle of the busy main street.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What should we do? This will cause a lot of trouble for the stores around us...

The only way to make this mess work is to...No, we can't.
Okay, here's what's going to happen.
Strategic retreat, Ohana. We're going to break through here and get away.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What? Eh?

Holding Ohana's small hand tightly, I push through the crowd.
The escape continues on forever, shrugging off people who are rushing to catch up with us.
